thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Juniper Pharmaceuticals Qtrly Basic EPS $0.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Juniper Pharmaceuticals Qtrly Basic EPS $0.11
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Juniper Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS INC - QTRLY BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.11
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS INC - QTRLY REVENUE $11.8 MILLION VERSUS $20.9 MILLION
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS INC - CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS WERE $21.4 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS - BELIEVES CURRENT CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS, CASH FROM OPERATIONS, WILL BE SUFFICIENT FOR AT LEAST NEXT TWELVE MONTHS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
